unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series. Dr. Sharma said it's a Grade 2 tear, right? Fingers crossed for a quick recovery, like Rishabh's. Heard the NCA rehab facility is top-notch, almost 10,000 sq ft! Recover well champ. Come back stronger, like a proper Punjabi munda! Need those wickets! Rs. 10 says he'll be back by Diwali!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series. Doctor Sharma said it's a Grade two tear, right? Fingers crossed for a quick recovery, like Rishabh's. Heard the N C A rehab facility is top-notch, almost ten thousand square feet! Recover well champ. Come back stronger, like a proper Punjabi munda! Need those wickets! Rupee ten says he'll be back by Diwali!
